channel.title: 89.3 on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in 89.3 on Paul Cutler

item.title: Another Reason Why I Love The Current
item.description: _Mary Lucia: Photo by Kyle Matteson under a CC-BY-NC-ND 2.0 license _ I vividly remember the day Rev105 changed formats. My wife and I were leaving work and climbed into the car in the carpool lot. Turning on the car, Van Halen was playing. I was surprised, but I’ve always been a Van Halen fan, and dug that they were playing it. Rev105 was the most eclectic radio station I’ve ever listened to, and while I was surprised to hear Van Halen, it wasn’t out of the norm from some of the things they played.

item.title: Live concerts on The Current
item.description:
89.3 The Current, a Minnesota Public Radio station, is ending the year with a bang and broadcasting four outstanding concerts that took place in Minnesota this year.
Rock the Garden 2010 (Photo licensed under a CC NC-SA-2.0 license by Chuck Olsen via Flickr) Monday, December 27th: Rock The Garden. An annual show hosted by The Current at the Walker Art Center, this year’s Rock the Garden featured Retribution Gospel Choir, Sharon Jones and the Dap-Kings and MGMT.
